Tyrael landed just inside the base and went straight to the bridge.

Tyrael: Cygnar! Get here fast and tell your men to move their plates! 
The Maximals are under attack!

He opened a commline with the Maximal Base.

Tyrael: Rodimus, this is Tyrael. I am giving the order to transform my 
base and to move to defend your position. I estimate our arrival in 
half a cycle. Tyrael out.

He moved to the command chair and pressed two buttons.

Tyrael: Computer, transform base to ship mode, authorization Tyrael 
Alpha-856-Upsilon.

Computer: Acknowledged. Transforming...

A deaf rumble started shaking the whole base. Parts of it started 
folding in while others began to expand.

Tyrael: Cheetah, Tigerhawk, battle stations! Man the cannons! Cygnar, 
meet me on the bridge. You'll assist me with the tactical display.
